# Autogenerated by tools/build/setup_cmake.py
# from tools/build/cmake_templates/ModuleBin.cmake
# Do not edit - any changes will be lost!

include_directories(${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.REGEX_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${CGAL_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${HDF5_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${IMP.EM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${PYTHON-IHM_INCLUDE_PATH})
link_directories(${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.REGEX_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${CGAL_LINK_PATH}
        ${HDF5_LINK_PATH}
        ${IMP.EM_LINK_PATH}
        ${NUMPY_LINK_PATH}
        ${PYTHON-IHM_LINK_PATH})
add_definitions("-DIMP_EXECUTABLE")

set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} ${BFF_CXX_FLAGS}")

include(Files.cmake)

foreach (bin ${cppfiles})
   GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(name ${bin} NAME_WE)
   add_executable(IMP.bff-${name} ${bin})
   target_link_libraries(IMP.bff-${name}     IMP.bff-lib
    ${IMP_kernel_LIBRARY};${IMP_cgal_LIBRARY};${IMP_algebra_LIBRARY};${IMP_display_LIBRARY};${IMP_score_functor_LIBRARY};${IMP_statistics_LIBRARY};${IMP_core_LIBRARY};${IMP_container_LIBRARY};${IMP_atom_LIBRARY};${IMP_em_LIBRARY}
    ${IMP.EM_LIBRARIES};${NUMPY_LIBRARIES};${BOOST.RANDOM_LIBRARIES};${BOOST.SYSTEM_LIBRARIES};${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LIBRARIES};${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LIBRARIES};${CGAL_LIBRARIES};${HDF5_LIBRARIES};${PYTHON-IHM_LIBRARIES};${BOOST.REGEX_LIBRARIES})
   set_target_properties(IMP.bff-${name} PROPERTIES
                         RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/bin"
                         OUTPUT_NAME ${name})
   set_property(TARGET "IMP.bff-${name}" PROPERTY FOLDER "IMP.bff")
   install(TARGETS "IMP.bff-${name}" DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_BINDIR})
   set(executables ${executables} IMP.bff-${name})
endforeach(bin)

set(pybins ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/bin/imp_bff)
foreach (pybin ${pybins})
  install(PROGRAMS ${pybin} DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_BINDIR})
endforeach(pybin)

set(IMP_bff_BINS ${executables} CACHE INTERNAL "" FORCE)
